{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=350&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=44 |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Edimax |model = EW-7612 |submodelappend = |submodel = PIn |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = December 10, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Edimax_EW-7612PIn |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = 8172 |subvendor_id = 1432 |subdevice_id = 7612 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NDD9576 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |ethoui = |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8191SE;RTL8191SEvB; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B003ZDECK8 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[http://m.linux-hardware-guide.com/2012-07-28-edimax-ew-7612pln-300mbps-wireless-pci-e Linux Hardware Guide] :The Edimax EW-7612PIn is a PCI-Express card (802.11n) with two antennas. :The Realtek chipset on the card is fully supported by Linux since Ubuntu 9.10. :The Kernel module [[rtl8192se]] is used for the card: 
03:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. 
        RTL8191SEvB \ Wireless LAN Controller [10ec:8172] (rev 10)
	Subsystem: Edimax Computer Co. Device [1432:7612]
	Kernel driver in use: rtl8192se
:The card has the following characteristics: 
description: Wireless interface
             product: RTL8191SEvB Wireless LAN Controller
             vendor: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd.
             physical id: 0
             bus info: pci@0000:03:00.0
             logical name: wlan0
             version: 10
             width: 32 bits
             clock: 33MHz
capabilities: pm msi pciexpress bus_master cap_list ethernet physical wireless
configuration: broadcast=yes driver=rtl8192se driverversion=3.0.0-14-generic \
firmware=N/A ip=192.168.1.1 latency=0 link=yes multicast=yes wireless=802.11bgn
resources: irq:18 ioport:d800(size=256) memory:dfefc000-dfefffff
 :[[Realtek]] RTL8191SE (1x2x2), RTL8192SE (2x2x2) ==See also== [[List of Edimax Wireless Devices]] *[[Edimax EW-7611PIn]] (FCC ID: NDD9576111029) *[[Edimax EW-7611UTn]] (FCC ID: NDD9576110905) *[[Edimax EW-7612UAn]] (FCC ID: NDD9576120904) *[[Edimax EW-7612UTn]] (FCC ID: NDD9576120904) [[Category:English Documentation]]
